mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post(title, content, member_id, category_id) VALUES (#{request.title}, #{request.content}, #{request.memberId}, #{request.categoryId});
mapper.select: SELECT p.content, f.stored_filename, f.original_filename, f.extension, f.post_id, f.sequence FROM post p LEFT OUTER JOIN file f ON p.id = f.post_id WHERE p.id = #{postId} ORDER BY f.sequence
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM post WHERE id = #{postId} AND member_id = #{memberId})
